mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (name, menu, price, address, phone, opening_time, closing_time, date, mem_id, img1, img2, img3) VALUES (#{name},#{menu},#{price},#{address},#{phone},#{opening_time},#{closing_time},now(),#{mem_id}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STORE ORDER BY St_NO DESC Limit 6;
